title: Middle East Crisis: Israel Orders Evacuations as Strikes Pound Gaza City

title: Kenya Protesters Call for President to Resign Despite His Withdrawal of the Tax Bill

title: How to Escape From the Russian Army

title: How a Tiny Circle of Advisers Helped Prod Macron to Call France’s Snap Election
